EmailTemplate.name: Calling No Contact Day 1
EmailTemplate.subject: Must have just missed you
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
This is nbsp;{!User.FirstName} from RapidAdvance. I just tried calling to help with your business financing inquiry.
Please call me back at 877-252-9728 at your earliest convenience.
I’ll be in the office until 8pm EST tonight.
Thank you and I look forward to speaking with you soon!
{!User.FirstName} {!User.LastName} | {!User.Title} RapidAdvance®
1001 Woodward Ave, Suite 1700 | Detroit, MI | 48226 Email:{!User.Email} | Website: www.RapidAdvance.com
